title: Game-Based Computer Writing Strategy Training Course: Project-Centered PBL Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of elementary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Social studies-linked program to strengthen working professionals’ document-writing skills. Focuses on training practical writing strategies directly applicable to learners’ work environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply essay introduction writing strategies with over 80% accuracy
Learners evaluate the four motivational elements (ARCS Model: Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction) in game-based writing activities at 3.5 points or higher on a 5-point scale
Learners complete 100% of writing deliverables applicable to real-world work environments through PBL projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
